name: bantamweight
content:

a boxer who weighs more than a flyweight but less than a featherweight, or this division of boxing weight: The Scottish bantamweight was diagnosed with a brain injury two days after losing the British title. He has won championships at both bantamweight and featherweight. He claimed the WBO bantamweight title a year ago. His grandfather was a world bantamweight champion. Compare
